TopicTitle: The secret of the North - Kerbalinian Odyssey a secret mission undertaken by Newmal

Articles.Content:
The signal detected is at the North pole, we must send Newmal on a secret mission and learn what is going on up there.

Episode 7 of Kerbalinian Odyssey and we have found something interesting that has captivated the administrator of the KSP, but its not out there in space on its here on Kerbin at the north pole to be precise.

Join Newmal and Co to find out what is at the north pole while we still have to continue on with our space program.
Man i love the design of the minishuttle you used to go to the northpole Anomaly! Can i make a copycat?

No problem I have put MK4.1 and MK4.3 in my Google drive folder link below

https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0ByjItGk3cEEdSk1RRmZ5am1KTVE&usp=sharing

MK4.1 seem to dip forward so you need to use SAS and you will have to limit time accelerate as when I used it to go and do something else just as I got up it dipped forward so II rushed to the controls and just saved Newmal Phew,

MK4.3 is a bit more stable. Also the two side tanks can be jettisoned when finished with but the remaining landing gears on the rear are so close together they make landing hard but MK4.3 is a little easier

Enjoy and Keep Kerbaling
